meanings.sent1: The teacher explained the limitational rules for the game.
meanings.sent2: The project had a limitational budget, so we had to be creative.
meanings.sent3: The limitational number of cookies left in the jar made everyone sad.
meanings.sent4: Her limitational patience finally ran out after waiting for hours.
meanings.sent5: The limitational space in the car made it hard to fit all our luggage.

meanings.sent1: The new law was limitational, restricting the use of certain chemicals.
meanings.sent2: Being on a diet can feel very limitational when you can't eat your favorite foods.
meanings.sent3: The limitational speed limit on the highway caused a lot of frustration for drivers.
meanings.sent4: The limitational time frame for the project made it challenging to complete.
meanings.sent5: Living in a small apartment can be quite limitational in terms of space.
